consume(address,uint256).details: Consume user fee, can only be called by the system caller.

estimateFee(address,uint256).details: Estimate user fee.     userFee = userTotalAmount * dailyFee / totalAmount - userUsage

estimateUsage((uint256,uint256),uint256).details: Estimate user usage     *      T: current timestamp     T': last timestamp     userUsage': last fee usage     *      if T - T' < feeRecoverInterval         userUsage = (1 - (T - T') / feeRecoverInterval) * userUsage'     else         userUsage = 0

estimateWithdrawableTimestamp(address,ad.details: Estimate wtihdrawable timestamp,     if the estimation fails, return 0.
